column9: alabama and move to umatilla in 1930. she worked as a letter carrier for the us postal service. she was a member of the first baptist church of altoona. helen is survived by her son stephen (joyce) kemp
column10: daughters donna (ronnie) peters and kathleen turner
column15: 5 grandchildren and 4 great-grandchildren. funeral services will be held at 3 pm saturday june 13
column16: 2015 at beyers funeral home. burial will follow at lakeside memory gardens.
